Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- City of Slidell
PW Law Enforcement District -- Tax Renewal 4.89 Mills - Sheriff - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Law Enforcement District of St. Tammany Parish, State of Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to levy a special tax of four and eighty-nine hundredths (4.89) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $9,628,040 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of providing funding for law enforcement?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. Tax Renewal -- 2 Mills Renewal - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of St. Tammany, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a two (2) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $3,930,691 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for programs of social welfare with the avails to be dedicated as follows: (i) 50% for the purpose of providing funds for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating authorized activities, services, programs and/or facilities of and for the St. Tammany Parish Council on Aging, and (ii) 50% for the purpose of providing funds for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating authorized activities, services, programs and/or facilities for individuals with mental retardation and/or disabled persons in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Mosquito Abatement District -- Millage Renewal 4.20 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Mosquito Abatement District Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the St. Tammany Parish Mosquito Abatement District (the "District''), levy a four and twenty hundredths (4.20) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027 (the "Tax") (an estimated $8,189,600 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of purchasing, maintaining and operating machinery, facilities and equipment necessary or useful in the eradication, abatement or control of mosquitoes and other arthropods of public health importance and maintaining an adequate administrative and operational staff for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Lighting Dist. No. 11 -- $50 Ser. Chg. Renewal - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road Lighting District No. 11 Proposition
(Service Charge Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Road Lighting District No. 11 of the Parish of St. Tammany, State of Louisiana (the "District"), through its governing authority, be authorized to assess, and to adopt a resolution providing for the assessment, of an annual service charge of not to exceed $50.00 per structure or lot (an estimated $10,050 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the service charge for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, to persons occupying residential and nonresidential structures and persons owning unoccupied structures located wholly or partly within the District and persons owning lots located wholly or partly within the District upon which no structure is located for the purpose of paying utility charges for road lighting and maintaining and operating road lighting facilities and equipment within the District, all as provided in, and subject to, the provisions of R.S. 48:1309.2 of the Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950, as amended?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. No. 7 -- 5.21 Mills Renewal- BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 7 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 7 of the Parish of St. Tammany, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of five and twenty-one hundredths (5.21) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $200,585 reasonably to be expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District, including the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?

Race.SpecificTitle: Recreation Dist. No. 12 -- 10 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Recreation District No. 12 of the Parish of St. Tammany, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of ten (10) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $283,406 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating parks, playgrounds, recreation centers and other recreational facilities in the District, together with the necessary furnishings and equipment therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: Northshore Harbor Center Dist. -- 3 Mills Renewal- BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Northshore Harbor Center District Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Northshore Harbor Center District (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of three (3) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $1,633,548 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the development, maintenance, operation and administration of the facilities of the District?
